name: OrderAction
title: An agent orders an object/product/service to be delivered/sent.

fields.name: actionStatus
fields.title: actionStatus
fields.description: Indicates the current disposition of the Action.

fields.name: agent
fields.title: agent
fields.description: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate). e.g. John wrote a book.

privileges.description: An agent can read order actions
Allow create order actions with potential status
privileges.filter: agent/user eq me() and actionStatus/alternateName eq 'PotentialActionStatus'

privileges.description: Allow update order actions when action status is potential
privileges.when: agent/user eq me() and actionStatus/alternateName eq 'PotentialActionStatus'
privileges.filter: agent/user eq me() and (actionStatus/alternateName eq 'PotentialActionStatus' or actionStatus/alternateName eq 'ActiveActionStatus')

privileges.description: Allow delete order actions when action status is potential
privileges.filter: agent/user eq me() and actionStatus/alternateName eq 'PotentialActionStatus'
